availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William L. Grainger (Logan County and Hopkins County, Ky, tailor and saw miller)

body.p: Logan County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, tailor and saw miller. Tennessee native. Married to Sarah V. Jones Grainger in Robertson County, Tennessee, on March 10, 1848. Father of Mary Grainger, John W. Grainger, Silla V. Grainger, and Willie N. Grainger. Tailor in Logan County, Kentucky, in 1850. Saw miller in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 2, p. 92A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 810.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Robertson County Marriages, 1859-1868.
"W. L. Grainger (1825-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial #144532011, accessed October 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/144532011.
